entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update template metadata for net8.0 #29059
  • On Windows, FileVersionInfo OriginalFilename of a self-contained application should reflect the published file name #29055

Closed

  • Creating a NuGet package with `dotnet build` command on a project targeting .NET 7 with no other dependencies results in an error. #29053
  • `dotnet test` loses `/p:Property=Value` command line arguments at SDK 7.0.100 #29066
  • Blazor Server Apps packed into a Tool can't find static assets #28881
  • Android Release : MainPage = new NavigationPage(new ContentPage()); crashes #28880
  • Workload installation failed: No space left on device #28962
    Discussion
  • `dotnet test` does not seem to pass properties to MSBuild anymore #29060

PullRequests

Created

  • Add error when specifying --output option for a solution #29065
    Area-CLI
  • Use CodeAnalysis.Simplification to expand and reduce generated subtrees. Add tests to cover CSharpFileBuilder and CSharpSyntaxWriter classes. #29058
    Area-GenAPI
  • [release/7.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined. (#28380) #29052
    Area-ReadyToRun

Merged

  • Ignore outdated workload manifest ID #29035
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads
  • Include ijwhost in DesignerRuntimeImplementationProjectOutputGroupOutput #28929
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TargetPlatformVersion normalization for Windows #29009
    Servicing-rejected
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix templating support for multiple parameters with same prefix #29027
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29011
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2044742 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clean up Razor Server pid file if the path doesn't exist #29029
    Area-CLI
  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package to release 7.2.xx branch #29017
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] ResolveReadyToRunCompilers: map non-portable rids when targetOS is determined (backport #28380) #28782
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
